on_entry: /execute as @s if block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s mblocks matches 0 run setblock 0 0 0 mycelium
/execute as @s unless block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s mblocks matches 0 run titleraw @s title {"rawtext":[{"text":"the_mushroom"}]}
/execute as @s unless block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s mblocks matches 0 run scoreboard players add @s mblocks 1
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s mblocks matches 0..699 run event entity @e[type=ks:floating_text] despawn
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s mblocks matches 0..699 run function mushroom
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s mblocks matches 700 run event entity @s snowy_taiga
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s mblocks matches 700 run summon ks:timer 0 1 0
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s mblocks matches 700 run setblock 0 0 0 bedrock
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s mblocks matches 700 run scoreboard players set @s mblocks 701
